snippet: Rangers defensemen Marc Staal and Dan Girardi have had ankle surgery, and the team said they should be ready for training camp.
abstract: New York Rangers defensemen Marc Staal and Dan Girardi undergo ankle surgery and are expected to be ready for training camp; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rangers defensemen Marc Staal and Dan Girardi have had ankle surgery, and the team said they should be ready for training camp.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Two Rangers Have Surgery
